text: 1970 profile snapshot of Karlsson in Stockholm Bobo Karlsson (30 December 1946 in Karlstad - 7 March 2017 in StockholmDeath notice in Svenska Dagbladet) was a Swedish journalist and author. He created the magazine City and worked as a journalist for Dagens Nyheter, Svenska Dagbladet and Göteborgs-Posten. Karlsson also published the books New York, New York: En guide till 80-talets metropolis (1981) and Drömmen om Kalifornien: Los Angeles, San Francisco & Las Vegas (1984) both by Prisma publishers. He would later also publish the books Urban Safari: 12 Storstäder and Urban Safari 2: 12 nya storstäder. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swedish journalists Category:People from Karlstad
title: Bobo Karlsson
